H0.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Scribe

H1.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Clerk

H2.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Translator

H3.text: Amanuensis is an archaic word for what profession. Sec'y

A4.text: In ancient Rome, an amanuensis (Latin āmanuēnsis, “secretary”, from ab-, “from” + manus, “hand”) was a slave or freedperson who provided literary and secretarial services such as taking dictation and perhaps assisting in composition.

A5.text: An amanuensis might act as a translator as well as transcriber.

A6.text: The responsibilities of clerical workers commonly include record keeping, filing, staffing service counters, screening callers, and other administrative tasks.
